scripts.test:output: pnpm run test:docs ; pnpm run test:warnings ; pnpm run test:entrypoints ; pnpm run test:imports ; pnpm run test:usage ; pnpm run test:usage:type ; pnpm run test:explain ; pnpm run test:callgraph
scripts.test:docs: stack run --cwd watchtower-frontends/vscode/testProject -- docs src/Main.elm src/Imported.elm --output=output/docs-files.json
scripts.test:docs:module: stack run --cwd watchtower-frontends/vscode/testProject -- docs Main Imported Alias --output=output/docs-modules.json
scripts.test:imports: stack run --cwd watchtower-frontends/vscode/testProject -- imports Main, AlternativeMain --output=output/imports.json
scripts.test:usage:type: stack run --cwd watchtower-frontends/vscode/testProject -- usage type Imported.MyType --output=output/usage-type.json
